sections.title: 1985 ACL MEMBERSHIP LIST
paragraphs: Following is a listing of the 1985 members of the Association for Computational Linguistics as of 3 December 1985. Personal members are listed first, ordered alphabetically by last name. Institutional members follow, ordered alphabetically by country, province (for Canada), city, and then institutional name; for the United States, the sorting is by ZIP-code.
